abstract: International Business Machines, the world’s largest computer-services provider, agreed to buy Telelogic for 5.2 billion kronor ($743 million), adding software design systems used by DaimlerChrysler and ABB.
lead_paragraph: International Business Machines, the world’s largest computer-services provider, agreed to buy Telelogic for 5.2 billion kronor ($743 million), adding software design systems used by DaimlerChrysler and ABB.

headline.main: I.B.M. Offers $743 Million for Telelogic of Sweden
